notes.text: Categories chapter (3A): Games as categories — blackout games, Kings Cup (party), Pizza Box (social), Red Flags (fun), Monopoly, Scythe (strategy). Circles/venn diagram of game types.
All Men Suck Percent — page about how women generalize men. Heavy asterisk (*) = second page flipping it, how men are still sexist. Both sides of the coin.
